Albertson & Davidson, LLP is a California trust and will litigation firm that focuses on helping abused beneficiaries navigate complex legal issues. They have recovered more than $250 million for their clients and are known for their aggressive trial attorneys who fight for their clients. The firm has a team of experienced legal professionals who are dedicated to achieving positive outcomes for their clients.

Founded in 2008, Albertson & Davidson, LLP was created by Stewart R. Albertson and Keith A. Davidson. The firm is committed to providing compassionate and skilled legal representation to clients facing battles over trusts, wills, and probate matters in California. They have a team of seven estate attorneys with extensive courtroom experience who work tirelessly to help clients resolve their legal problems.
